description: Clean room acquisition for critical inspection and assembly operations for micro-fluidic medical devices. Including delivery, installation, start-up and training on site.
full_summary:
# Tender Alert: Clean Room Equipment

**Reference:** WS3630127129-Doc3696008055

**Publication Date:** 2022-10-07

## Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the National Research Council of Canada (NRC), is inviting proposals for the acquisition of a Class 10 000 clean room (free standing clean room (FSCR)). This facility will be used for critical inspection and assembly operations for micro-fluidic medical devices.

## Requirements

* The clean room equipment must be delivered, installed, started up, and trained on site within the required timeframe.
* The facility will be located at the NRC Medical Devices Research Centre in Boucherville, Quebec, Canada.

## Important Dates

* Tender closing date: 2022-10-28T14:00:00 (2 PM EDT)
* Expected contract start date: TBA
* Expected contract end date: 2023-03-31

## Procurement Details

* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price
* Notice type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contact Information

* Alia Ishii-Magary (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [alia.ishii-magary@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alia.ishii-magary@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not provided
* Address: Department of Public Works and Government Services, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

## Tender Submission

* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the tender closing date to avoid being declared non-responsive.
* Bids submitted after the tender closing date will not be considered.
